Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.room

Class StandardRoomBuilder

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.room.StandardRoomBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
RoomBuilder
public final class StandardRoomBuilder extends Object implements RoomBuilder
Standard implementation of the RoomBuilder interface. This class follows the Singleton pattern and offers a single instance of this class.
